verses.name: Lamentations 4:13
verses.text: For the sins of her prophets, and the iniquities of her priests, that have shed the blood of the just in the midst of her,

verses.name: Lamentations 4:14
verses.text: They have wandered as blind men in the streets, they have polluted themselves with blood, so that men could not touch their garments.

verses.name: Lamentations 4:15
verses.text: They cried unto them, Depart ye; it is unclean; depart, depart, touch not: when they fled away and wandered, they said among the heathen, They shall no more sojourn there.
